title: High Grade SGC 50-70 1909 Obaks for sale w/ horizontals!! Prices lowered!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: High Grade SGC 50-70 1909 Obaks for sale w/ horizontals!! Prices lowered!!
posts.post_content:
Had a few extra 1909 Obaks I thought I'd make available.  All are gorgeous with sharp corners and edges, no wear, no wrinkling - except for one smaller one on the front of the D. Lewis card, and clean and damage free backs.  Prices marked below include shipping.  Thanks in advance,

Brackenridge SGC 60 (horizontal) -- $475 [SOLD!!]
D. Lewis SGC 50 (does have the one wrinkle) -- $175 [SOLD!!]
Cameron SGC 50 -- [SOLD!!]
Brown SGC 70 (horizontal) - only approx. 10-12 1909 Obaks graded higher!! -- $500

Thanks much!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]



[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=41884&d=1310175662[/IMG]

Hey Brian,

Email sent for Brackenridge.

Prices lowered on the remaining three 09 Obaks....thanks!

Brian

Thanks guys,
